title: RhinoCommon - Select / Highlight SubObject

code_blocks.code:
import Rhino
import scriptcontext
import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs

def DoSomething():
    obj_ref = rs.GetObject(filter=8, preselect=False, subobjects=True)
    if obj_ref:
        index = obj_ref.Surface().ComponentIndex()
        obj = obj_ref.Object()
        for x in xrange(4):
           obj.HighlightSubObject(index, True)
           scriptcontext.doc.Views.Redraw()
           rs.Sleep(200)
           obj.HighlightSubObject(index, False)
           scriptcontext.doc.Views.Redraw()
           rs.Sleep(200)

if __name__=="__main__":
    DoSomething()
